Use OkHttp to avoid connection issues in some android versions

The Issue: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11810447/httpurlconnection-worked-fine-in-android-2-x-but-not-in-4-1-no-authentication-c

Solution: use http://square.github.io/okhttp/ . Their implementation correctly handles this issue

See: https://github.com/kageiit/egit-github/commit/c1fc23adae6a552005a30d4133ca4f33446f2117

Clean up ExploreActivity.

This should hopefully fix this Bugsense-reported exception:

The application's PagerAdapter changed the adapter's contents without
calling PagerAdapter#notifyDataSetChanged! Expected adapter item count:
1, found: 3 Pager id: com.gh4a:id/pager Pager class: class
android.support.v4.view.ViewPager Problematic adapter: class
com.gh4a.activities.ExploreActivity$ThisPageAdapter

Exclude ourself when redirecting to browser.

As our browse filter matches most Github links, Octodroid is (confusing)
also included in the disambiguation list when choosing the 'Open in
browser' option inside Octodroid. Fix that by using our own chooser,
just like we already did when we couldn't open links our intent filter
matched on.

Switch to new Github bindings.

Those fixed URL encoding for content list fetching; fetching contents
for paths with spaces now works.
Upgrade prettify to latest version.

Use screen estate better in diff view.

Shrink the huge padding to the left (and right), and make font sizes
somewhat consistent to prettified code output.

In case we need larger fonts at some point, this should probably happen
in the form of a default zoom level option.
Adjust foreground color of change headers in light theme.
Fix BugSense reported NPE.

Convert more activities to derive from WebViewerActivity.

To do that, move some code that is not specific to the web viewer to the
respective activities.
Use WebViewerActivity to fix a number of problems:
- Fix the search field foreground color for DarkActionBar theme
- Properly handle dark theme for wiki and blog activities
- Show spinning circle until page is fully loaded
Deduplicate code.
Deduplicate more code and remove dead code.

Switch to new Github bindings.

Those initialize the comment position to -1 if it isn't included in
JSON.
Don't show line comments in commit comment list.
Cleanup.
Fix editing pull request comments.
Remove duplicate divider on top of comment list.

Indicate number of comments in commit file list.

In order to not duplicate stuff, clean up the comment icon code by
creating an attribute resource for it and assigning the drawable from
XML.
Deduplicate more code.
Avoid fetching comments more often than needed.
Properly filter outdated comments.
Fix multi-line comments taking large amounts of space.

Properly handle renames.

Renames with no additional changes have no patch attached, so we
shouldn't make those clickable. As a non-clickable entry under 'Files
Changed' would be a little confusing, introduce a separate header for
renamed files.
Restore possibility to view changed image files.
Fix file and directory icon color in DarkActionBar theme.
Improve screen estate usage of markdown rendering.

Fix Bugsense reported NPE.

Branch selection needs mRepository to be initialized.
Fix some Bugsense reported NPEs.

Fix handling of refs in bookmarks.

Ref and branch tag are two sides of the same medal, with the branch tag
representing different refs over time. When storing both the ref and the
branch tag in the bookmark and coming back to that bookmark at some
later point in time, the presented data will (unexpectedly) be the state
of the branch when the bookmark was created instead of its current
state.
Fix that by using the selected branch tag as ref if it's known (by
branch or tag selection), and the ref otherwise.
Fix branch/tag select dialog cancel behaviour.
Fix non-Holo alert icon on API level > 10.
Also compare tags by name.

Refactor issue list activity.

In order to make it consistent to the pull request activity, have
open/closed tabs instead of having 3 tabs that present the same data in
different sort orders. Make the sort order selectable by a menu instead.
Fix Bugsense reported NPE.

Fix unsetting assignee and milestone.

The bindings expect user and milestone to be set; if they're null it
means 'don't touch it'.

Fix unsetting assignee and milestone.

The bindings expect user and milestone to be set; if they're null it
means 'don't touch it'.
Use the correct selected background on API 19.

Fix commit file item padding and use a consistent style for header
labels.

Overhaul issue and milestone activities.

Provide a little more padding (and make the padding consistent in
general) and fix code duplication between milestone creation and
editing.
Allow unsetting a due date.
Fix cancel behaviour of milestone/assignee selection dialogs.

Merge pull request #214 from maniac103/commit-comment-for-upstream

Misc. improvements.
Merge branch 'master' into commit-comment
Fix Bugsense-reported NPE.
Exclude ourselves when attempting to show a file in the browser.
Some cleanup.
Provide a spinning wheel while loading pull request count.
Use Holo button bar style for 'view more' button if possible.
Fix header line width.

Implement a (persistent) text size option for web view activities.

TODO: Move it to a settings activity, together with the theme setting.

Disable built-in zoom controls.

We have a text size setting now, which - if needed - still can be
overriden by a pinch-to-zoom gesture. Also, the built-in zoom controls
look ugly (non-Holo) and frequently cause logcat to be spammed with
error messages.

Also don't enable support for multiple windows when we don't actually
support it.
Rename wiki title
Centralize all settings in a settings activity.
Fix a number of inspection warnings.
Fix app behaviour while not logged in.
Prefer avatars with explicit URL over those loaded via gravatar.
Fix ambiguous activity request codes.

Update parent activities and fragments when changing issues and
comments.
Only provide add/edit comment links to authorized users.

Move actions for existing comments into a popup and add a reply action.

Also restrict editing/deleting comments to own comments.
Fix duplicate file change entries after reloading issue details.

Fix luminance calculation.

Use relative luminance (as described in [1]) and not the L component of
the HSL color model, as that better fits our purpose of adjusting the
foreground color to the brightness of the background.

[1] http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relative_luminance

Improves event title for PullRequestReviewCommentEvent,
CommitCommentEvent and IssueCommentEvent.
Cleanup.
Improve event list title.
Format list of pushed commits into one TextView.

Fix editing issue comments on pull requests.

The issue happened due to pull request issue comments (general remarks
not attached to the code) with pull request comments (code remarks in
the pull request). Make the distinction clearer by naming the edit
activity accordingly.

Get rid of wide viewport.

Replace it by tuning the CSS to make the viewport as wide as needed.
Also tune markdown CSS to use the screen estate better.

De-minify CSS files.

We don't need to save bandwidth for our local files, and the tiny
improvement in loading speed (if there's actually a measurable
difference) doesn't justify the complication in debugging,

Fix plural usage.

Convert plurals that only are used with static counts to strings, and
add count format placeholder where appropriate.
Fix code format.

Use monospace font for gist SHAs.

We do this for commit SHAs as well.

Github has deprecated the gravatar_id field.

That means we can't use it as cache key anymore. Instead, use the user
ID.

Rename GravatarHandler to AvatarHandler.

Reflects the fact the image fetching isn't done from Gravatar anymore.
Fixed branch ref not being filled correctly.

Cleanup.

Get rid of duplicate color definition, and use a single TextView for
repo owner and repo name. The latter also improves line break behaviour.

Improve commit header layout.

Fix margins of change summary and make the commit title stand out a
little more.

Improve issue header layout.

Make margins and text size consistent to what is used elsewhere, and
remove margin under comment header (the list view items have their own
padding).
Print comment count in pull requests as well.
Bold actor names in headers.
Make release header look less crammed.
Fix a number of inspection warnings.
More actor bolding.
Show comment count in commit list.

Switch to new Github bindings with gzip support.

Reduces request data usage (dramatically for some requests: e.g. the
request for closed pull requests in this repo shrinks from 478k to 40k)

Update Github bindings.

Those have fixed gzip support and use the newer watcher API.
Update to MINT SDK and workaround their gradle repo failing.
Fix commit tab title.
Allow editing commit comments.

Invalidate image getter on reload.

Otherwise it'll return the old cached content even though we loaded new
content.

Tweak a few layouts.

Make padding consistent, and get rid of deprecated fill_parent
attribute.
Fix user search.
Make user search result extra data match the format used elsewhere.
Fix bold tags for forked string and add another case of actor bolding.
Show file size in file listing.

CSS fixes

- Make sure text (diff/code) headers always fill the whole width
- Fix image background for dark theme
Ensure margins are correct also if code/diff is wider than the screen.

Make selection dialog behaviour consistent to guidelines.

Select on list item selection, remove the now superfluous ok button and
consistently use a cancel button.

Translate ok string ourselves.

It makes no sense to have a single localized string in a sea of
unlocalized ones.

Add support for starred gists.

Closes #163.

Add support for showing issue events.

Show them together with issue comments, sorted by date.

Closes #114.
Cleanup.
Fix comment margins.
Redirect to correct user.

Consistentify border colors.

Use the same border color in light and dark theme (a medium grey works
fine for both) and for images and comments.

Fix creating pull request comments.

commitId needs to be the commit SHA, not the object SHA.

Clarify object SHA vs. tree SHA.

Use only a single intent extra for the latter; and fix some more object
vs. tree SHA mixups.
Fix event refresh behaviour.
Encode label name
Fix NPE. Some of the PullRequestReviewCommentEvent does not return PullRequest

Use helper methods to open activities.

Ensures getting the extras right.
Remove unused imports.

Fix 'View file at...'.

The commits API expects commit SHAs, not tree SHAs.
Fix overly long line.

Fix event line wrapping behaviour.

Setting the monospace font must be done in a separate span, as spans
changing the text metrics must subclass MetricAffectingSpan, which
ClickableSpan doesn't do.

Properly fix pull request comment SHA vs. ref mixup.

The original problem commit 31aea026ca48858dff345f42d6efc64011760f75
intended to fix was the usage of a file SHA as commit SHA. As we're
generally not interested in file SHAs, drop passing them around and only
use commit SHA, which we can later pass on as a tree ref to
FileViewerActivity if needed.
Fix drone download url.
Merge branch 'master' into commit-comment

Make IntentUtils return intents instead of starting activities.

Gives us more flexibility with what to do with the intent; it e.g.
allows calling startActivityForResult().

Update commit list fragment (for comment count) when having edited
comments.

TODO: Pass more fine-granular information (e.g. whether comments were
only edited) in activity result.
Merge branch 'commit-comment' of https://github.com/slapperwan/gh4a into commit-comment

Fix trending repos. Hopefully this API provider
will last.
Fix reopening pull requests.
Fix pull request menu behaviour and reopen failure toast.

Use normal commit compare API for pull request commit list.

The pull request commit API sometimes incorrect commit comment counts.
The commit compare API doesn't have this problem, so using it works
around this problem. The Github app does the same thing; and as a bonus
we need less code in total.
Cleanup.
Keep all trending pages loaded.
Fix variable name.
Make look of trend list consistent to other lists.

Disable MINT network monitoring.

We aren't interested in it, and it looks like it converts
ConnectExceptions to its own DelegationExceptions, which breaks the
assumptions in our catch clauses and makes the app crash.
Use correct edit activity for commit comments.
Fix going to user's organization(s).
Refresh pull request event list when changing PR comments.

Mark submodules as such in the file list.

As Github lists them as 'file' in the contents API for backwards
compatibility reasons, we have to track the submodule list via separate
API.
Improve header string for PR comments in event list.
Hide event list header if there's no event.

Make branch/tag switching more clever.

Don't needlessly reload the repo object, and don't reapply initial page
selection on each repo reload.

Fix readme reloading.

Show the loading wheel again during reloading, and recreate loader to
get the new ref into it.
Fix up padding and make 'no repos' text consistent to 'no readme' text.
Fix gist title underline being too wide.
Use new API field to display who changed the assignee.
Release config and up version
Use param instead of prompt
